text: The Belgium women's national under-21 field hockey team represents Belgium in women's international under-21 field hockey competitions and is controlled by the Royal Belgian Hockey Association, the governing body for field hockey in Belgium. The team plays in the EuroHockey Junior Championships and has qualified twice for the Junior World Cup. ==Tournament record== ===Junior World Cup=== * 2013 – 13th place * 2016 – 6th place * 2021 – Qualified ===EuroHockey Junior Championship=== * 1979 – * 1981 – 4th place * 1984 – 6th place * 2008 – 7th place * 2012 – 5th place * 2014 – 5th place * 2017 – * 2019 – 4th place ===EuroHockey Junior Championship II=== * 2000 – 6th place * 2006 – * 2010 – ===EuroHockey Junior Championship III=== * 2004 – Source: ==See also== * Belgium men's national under-21 field hockey team * Belgium women's national field hockey team ==References== Field hockey Category:Women's national under-21 field hockey teams
title: Belgium women's national under-21 field hockey team
